Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Savor the Sting]{Savor the Sting}; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Retributive Pain]{Retributive Pain}

You punish those who displease you with the sharp sting of pain.
name: Pain Domain
